title: Autism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/13/18
itunes:title: Autism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/13/18
description:
George Noory and JB Handley discuss autism, which spurred him to create a non-profit organization after his son was diagnosed with the disease, some of the causes that have led to the increase in the disease and what society can do to cure it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
